title: looking for a Diamond+ top laner for OOL
body:
hello 

i am currently seeking a TOP main that is a Diamond or above to join a mix plat and above team for a tournament.
we are looking for someone who is accepting the role as a top to play different champions that can solo lanes and TP to fights when needed.

Requirements:

•having Skype (to communication with the team)
•happy to watch replay and listen to advice to everyone on the team for improvement
•champ pool

if anyone is interested leave a comment or even add me lnsanic the I is a L.

HOPE TO SEE YOU SOON
